程序包 com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    ILoadingLayout  
    IPullToRefresh<T extends android.view.View>  
    PullToRefreshBase.OnLastItemVisibleListener
    Simple Listener that allows you to be notified when the user has scrolled to the end of the AdapterView.
    PullToRefreshBase.OnPullEventListener<V extends android.view.View>
    Listener that allows you to be notified when the user has started or finished a touch event.
    PullToRefreshBase.OnRefreshListener<V extends android.view.View>
    Simple Listener to listen for any callbacks to Refresh.
    PullToRefreshBase.OnRefreshListener2<V extends android.view.View>
    An advanced version of the Listener to listen for callbacks to Refresh.
